page.title: 18BERKELEY INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: 1.Landline Services deliver goods from ships nationwide.2.Progress Control: site services repair or restore aerial systems.3.Tasmin,Manufacturers.4.Susan Foxtan Showroom.5.Black & White Coaches.6.Dyson & Co Electrical. .7.Howlock sealed strips for double glazing.8.Trent Roadways coaches.9.Carousel Clothing Factory. 10.Linfood Cash & Carry.11.H.G.Couzens 12.Trent House Health Authority. 13. Binns Storehouse serving Scunthorpe & Grimsby.14.Angelo's Ices.15. O.T.S. OffShore Transport ship lorries to Europe.16.Berkeley Glazing.17.K.P.S. Tyre Services Ltd.18.S.J.Lynch & Co Specialists in steel fabrication. 19. Daugrove Ltd. supply metals for steelworks.20.T.J.S. Car & Van hire. 21.Stafford Transport Training. 22.Jones Car Body Repair.23.Grant Lyon Eagre supply railway tracks.
